title: I'm Going to a Wedding in May—Here Are the Dresses I'm Eyeing From Saks and Bloomingdale's
excerpt: With wedding season upon us, I'm shopping the 25%-off sales at Saks and Bloomingdale's for a dress.
text: At this point in my life, I probably should already own a few designated wedding guest dresses. But the truth is I've only been to a few weddings and usually just rent something for the occasion. With another one coming up in May, I realized it's time to start building a collection of formal attire—rather than scrambling for a last-minute outfit every time.Naturally, I checked Saks Fifth Avenue and Bloomingdale's knowing they always have a solid selection of elevated gowns—only to find that both are currently running Friends & Family 25%-off sales. Here are the dresses I'm eyeing as contenders for my Memorial Day wedding weekend in California.Saks Fifth Avenue Ramy Brook Shauna Satin Strapless Open Back Midi-Dress I love this for a colorful option. Tanya Taylor Maya Satin Midi-Dress Halters are my favorite for a spring or summer wedding. Ramy Brook Benita Asymmetric A-Line Gown Asymmetrical silhouettes always look so elevated. Nicholas the Label Arella Polka Dot Silk Halterneck Maxi Dress Polka dots are a forever print in my eyes, but they're also trending this season. Nicholas the Label Makenna Corset Midi-Dress I'm obsessed with this sweet baby-blue hue. Ramy Brook Tatiana High-Neck Satin Gown A high neck looks effortlessly put-together. Nicholas the Label Cory Corset-Waist Midi-Dress Perfect for a black-tie event. Philosophy di Lorenzo Serafini Duchesse Cocktail Dress Kay Unger Gianna Stretch-Crêpe Midi-Dress This green shade is so fun and a bit more unexpected. Vince Scoopneck Slip Dress Sometimes I prefer going classic with just a simple slip dress. Nicholas the Label Cory Corset-Waist Midi-Dress I'm into the cut and corset waist on this one. Teri Jon by Rickie Freeman Satin A-Line Cowlneck Midi-Dress You can never go wrong with a satin A-line. Acler Woodlake Satin Maxi Dress Bloomingdale's Helmut Lang Convertible Dress This Helmut Lang dress is perfect to invest in while it's on sale. And it's convertible, so you can wear it as a minidress, too. Norma Kamali Strapless Side Slit Gown You can't go wrong with a dress from Norma Kamali. DKNY Exposed Seam Midi Dress I'm into the unique stitching. STAUD Gramercy Boat Neck Dress This Staud boat-neck might be the one. Veronica Beard Mavis Dress I never knew red for a wedding was so divisive. Lioness Field of Dreams Off-The-Shoulder Maxi Dress This dress has been all over TikTok. Norma Kamali Sleeveless Low Back Draped Gown The draping and low back look so sophisticated. Ciao Lucia Severine Slip Dress Ciao Lucia for less than $200? RE/DONE Halter Slip Dress And this is a whole 70% off.
html:
At this point in my life, I probably should already own a few designated wedding guest dresses. But the truth is I've only been to a few weddings and usually just rent something for the occasion. With another one coming up in May, I realized it's time to start building a collection of formal attire—rather than scrambling for a last-minute outfit every time.

Naturally, I checked Saks Fifth Avenue and Bloomingdale's knowing they always have a solid selection of elevated gowns—only to find that both are currently running Friends & Family 25%-off sales. Here are the dresses I'm eyeing as contenders for my Memorial Day wedding weekend in California.

Saks Fifth Avenue

Ramy Brook

Shauna Satin Strapless Open Back Midi-Dress

I love this for a colorful option.

Tanya Taylor

Maya Satin Midi-Dress

Halters are my favorite for a spring or summer wedding.

Ramy Brook

Benita Asymmetric A-Line Gown

Asymmetrical silhouettes always look so elevated.

Nicholas the Label

Arella Polka Dot Silk Halterneck Maxi Dress

Polka dots are a forever print in my eyes, but they're also trending this season.

Nicholas the Label

Makenna Corset Midi-Dress

I'm obsessed with this sweet baby-blue hue.

Ramy Brook

Tatiana High-Neck Satin Gown

A high neck looks effortlessly put-together.

Nicholas the Label

Cory Corset-Waist Midi-Dress

Perfect for a black-tie event.

Philosophy di Lorenzo Serafini

Duchesse Cocktail Dress

Kay Unger

Gianna Stretch-Crêpe Midi-Dress

This green shade is so fun and a bit more unexpected.

Vince

Scoopneck Slip Dress

Sometimes I prefer going classic with just a simple slip dress.

Nicholas the Label

Cory Corset-Waist Midi-Dress

I'm into the cut and corset waist on this one.

Teri Jon by Rickie Freeman

Satin A-Line Cowlneck Midi-Dress

You can never go wrong with a satin A-line.

Acler

Woodlake Satin Maxi Dress

Bloomingdale's

Helmut Lang

Convertible Dress

This Helmut Lang dress is perfect to invest in while it's on sale. And it's convertible, so you can wear it as a minidress, too.

Norma Kamali

Strapless Side Slit Gown

You can't go wrong with a dress from Norma Kamali.

DKNY

Exposed Seam Midi Dress

I'm into the unique stitching.

STAUD

Gramercy Boat Neck Dress

This Staud boat-neck might be the one.

Veronica Beard

Mavis Dress

I never knew red for a wedding was so divisive.

Lioness

Field of Dreams Off-The-Shoulder Maxi Dress

This dress has been all over TikTok.

Norma Kamali

Sleeveless Low Back Draped Gown

The draping and low back look so sophisticated.

Ciao Lucia

Severine Slip Dress

Ciao Lucia for less than $200?

RE/DONE

Halter Slip Dress

And this is a whole 70% off.
